name: TA.I. Strike
desc: During damage calculation, if your monster battles an opponent's monster: Your battling monster's ATK becomes equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, during that damage calculation only, also the controller of a monster destroyed by that battle takes damage equal to their destroyed monster's original ATK at the end of the Damage Step. If your "@Ignister" monster would be destroyed by battle, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only activate 1 "TA.I. Strike" per turn.
